name: Kikëo
description:
My work in progress shmup for the Shmup Showcase. (https://itch.io/jam/basic-shmup)
successor to (https://smellyfishstiks.itch.io/glucose-blast-wip) which also wasn't completed, but I'd be down to keep working on this at a later time. The basis is there just needs enemies, areas, music, and to finish up the last bits of the gameloop.
Not done but I felt bad not posting anything so here it is anyways. Hope it's enjoyable despite it's weirdness.
